assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All patients provided the informed consent for the genetic studies and skin biopsies collection. For supplementary videos, consent from patient 1 (P1) was obtained. For patient 2 (P2), the family refused to provide informed consent to publish the video. The study was conducted following the Declaration of Helsinki, and the ethical committee of the institution of Sant Joan de Déu Hospital has approved it.
